About Me

Let's learn more about Krystal...

BIO

Hi! I'm Krystal a front-end web developer, product manager and freelancer who currently resides in Miami, FL. I have a passion for technology and I am always looking to expand my knowlegde. My current web development stack is HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Bootstrap, JavaScript, React and Node.I also dabble in a little PHP and Ruby on Rails.
